article_title: The Morning Download: Automation Is Key to Security in Age of DevOps
article_text:
Mike Blake/Reuters

“The only realistic way of maintaining security in an environment that grows so rapidly and changes so quickly is to make it automation first,” said Jason Chan, director of engineering in cloud security at Netflix Inc. “When you move faster, it’s just logical that the ability for humans to operate effectively diminishes.”
